  • List of Nepali Coffee Industries, Companies with their Brands

    Nov 8, 2017    info    3 min read

    Site is being upgraded. Apologies if site takes a while loading content in your mobile device.
    Listed below are the various Coffee Industries registered and operating in Nepal. This tabular list consists of their address, coffee product or brand present in market, companies' contact detail including email and phone number. This List has data for 29 Nepali Coffee Industried and Companies with their brands in Nepal and international market. The following data is obtained from Nepal Government hence high accuraccy is tried to maintain. If you find any errors kindly comment below.
    Industry Address Brand Contact E-mail
    Highland Coffee Promotion Company Limited Sano Bharyang Kathmandu Himcafe, Necco 6635688 hcpcl@info.com.np
    Royal Everest Coffee Mill Lokanthali, Bhaktapur EVEREST Coffee 4413959 late@mos.com.np
    Nepal Organic Coffee products Madan Pokhara, Palpa NOCP’s Himalayan Arabica Coffee, Morning Fresh nocp1989@hotmail.com
    Beans Coffee Pvt. Ltd. Kupondole Lalitpur Mustang Coffee, Trekkers Easy, Dripping Coffee lamapk@hotmail.com
    Himalaya Coffee Products Lalitpur Harissiddi- Himalaya coffee 5531836 himalaya_coffee@hotmail.com
    Planteck Coffee Estate Pvt. Ltd. Nuwakot Jalpa Gold (Espresso blend,Jalpa Gold, Mount Everest Supreme) 4416327 unicorntrade@wlink.com.np
    Nepal Mountain Coffee Products (Shut down) Bagdole, Lalitpur Nepal Montain Coffee 5538656
    Buddha Organic Coffee Industries Pvt. Ltd. Buddha Organic Coffee 01-4280599 buddha.organic@yahoo.com
    Coffee Cooperative Union Ltd Thapagaun, Lalitpur Lalitpur Organic Coffee, Jureli Coffee
    Organic Coffee Cooperative Kusma Parbat Dhaulagiri Coffee 067-690599 organiccoffeeparbat@gmail.com
    Alpine Coffee Estate Katman’Du Coffee
    Lekali Coffee Estate Industry Lekali Single Estate Premium

    Pathavaiya Deurali Gharelu Coffee uddyog Leknath, Kaski Machhapuchhre Flying bird Natural Coffee 061-692775
    District Cooperative Union Gulmi Gulmi Coffee gulmi_coffee@yahoo.com
    Gazzab-Co Tea Industry New Baneshwor Ktm Danda-Pakha Organic Coffee gazzabkotea@gmail.com
    Nepal Tea and Coffee Promotion Center Thamel, Kathmandu Tealaya Rare & Organic Coffee sakhejung@gmail.com
    Camel Coffee (Nepal) P. Ltd. ( Kaldi coffee, japan)
    Greenland Organic Farm Pvt.Ltd. New Baneshwor, Kathmandu Himalayan Arabica 01-4780919 info@himalayanArabica.com
    Great Himalayan Organic Coffee Estate Rasuwa
    Machhapuchhre Organic Coffee Uddyog Malepatan, Pokhara Machhapuchhre Organic Coffee, Himalayan Drip Coffee 061-524141
    Himalayan Java Kathmandu Himalayan Java info@himalayanjava.com

    Nepal Everest Coffee Mill Pvt Ltd Everest Coffee
